poemContent:
Oi Oi, Enga-land, It's coooming home,
GCSE PE Grade 1!
Debating with the boooys,
If Ronaldo is the worst, if
Messi is the best, gonna have a hit at
the chippie after the game,
but first "What are you doing REF!"

wanna hear a joke? Arsenal's defense!
Spent all my money on footie games,
I'm running out of rent.
But FOOTIE 24/7, is all have with
me friends
And every time they miss a shot, got
me hands up on my head.

Footie is my whole life,
watching on TV,
almost homeless, crappy apartment,
screaming at the screen,
lost my wife, alcahol addict,
to be a baller was my dream,
Just another brute in the crowd
My identity is my team.

So Oi Oi Liiions,
I may just look insane,
but you should understand, Idiot, why I rant
after the game.

My white, chicken tikka
eating mates and I shout racial slurs right at that ref.

Faking physical injuries, that blind bollocks
bastard.

And booting him to death.
